    • Method Detail

      • facetFilter

        public FacetBuilder facetFilter(FilterBuilder filter)

      • nested

        public FacetBuilder nested(String nested)
        Sets the nested path the facet will execute on. A match (root object) will then cause all the nested objects matching the path to be computed into the facet.

      • global

        public FacetBuilder global(boolean global)
        Marks the facet to run in a global scope, not bounded by any query.
